title: Store Manager
label: Store Manager
description: Leads all store operations including sales, labor, compliance, cash management, and customer experience, responsible for P&L performance and team development at the unit level.
responsibilities: Drive store sales and profitability
Manage store labor scheduling and performance
Ensure compliance with company and regulatory standards
Oversee cash management and banking operations
Lead team hiring, training, and development
Deliver exceptional customer experience
traditionalWorkflow: Spend 3-6 hours per week manually creating labor schedules
Review paper task checklists daily (60-70% completion)
Manually count cash and reconcile (30-90 min/day)
React to compliance violations discovered during quarterly audits
Print and post corporate communications (40-60% read rate)
agenticWorkflow: Review AI-generated schedules in 30-60 min/week
Monitor real-time task completion dashboard (95-99% completion)
Smart safe auto-reconciles cash in 5-10 min/day
Receive real-time compliance alerts with guided remediation
Mobile app delivers targeted messages with 95%+ read tracking
painPointsAddressed: Labor costs reduced 10-20% through AI optimization
Cash management time reduced to 5-10 min (vs 30-90 min)

title: Assistant Store Manager
label: Assistant Store Manager
description: Supports store manager in daily operations including task execution, staff supervision, compliance monitoring, and operational excellence initiatives.
responsibilities: Supervise daily store operations and staff
Ensure task completion and operational standards
Monitor compliance with policies and procedures
Assist with labor scheduling and coverage
Support cash management and banking operations
Handle customer escalations and service issues
traditionalWorkflow: Manually assign tasks to associates from paper checklists
Conduct periodic walk-throughs to check task completion
Cover cash register during rushes and breaks
Manually track compliance items in binder
Handle last-minute schedule changes via phone calls
agenticWorkflow: Review AI-assigned tasks and approve recommendations
Monitor real-time task dashboard for exceptions
Smart safes and POS provide instant cash variance alerts
Compliance app flags issues with photo-based verification
Self-service app handles most schedule swaps automatically
painPointsAddressed: Cash handling simplified with auto-variance detection

title: District Manager
label: District Manager
description: Oversees 8-15 store locations, responsible for sales performance, operational excellence, compliance, talent development, and driving corporate initiatives across the district.
responsibilities: Drive sales and profitability across district stores
Ensure operational and compliance standards
Develop and coach store management teams
Conduct store audits and performance reviews
Implement corporate programs and initiatives
Manage district P&L and budget
traditionalWorkflow: Spend 30-50% of time conducting manual store audits
Travel to each store for quarterly compliance checks (2-4 hours each)
Manually review task completion binders during visits
Discover compliance violations weeks after occurrence
Consolidate store performance data manually in spreadsheets
agenticWorkflow: Focus 70-80% of time on coaching vs audits (exception-based visits)
Real-time compliance dashboards show all stores continuously
AI flags stores at risk for proactive intervention
Receive instant alerts for critical violations
Automated performance dashboards across all stores

title: Loss Prevention Specialist
label: Loss Prevention Specialist
description: Investigates shrink incidents, monitors video surveillance, conducts store audits, and implements theft prevention strategies to minimize inventory loss.
responsibilities: Investigate theft and shrink incidents
Monitor video surveillance for suspicious activity
Conduct store LP audits and training
Build cases for prosecution of theft
Analyze shrink patterns and trends
Partner with law enforcement on ORC cases
traditionalWorkflow: Manually search 10-40 hours of video footage per investigation
Discover theft/fraud during annual physical inventory
Conduct quarterly LP audits at each assigned store
Manually track shrink data in spreadsheets
Reactive investigations (after losses already occurred)
agenticWorkflow: AI video analytics provides timestamped clips in 30 min - 2 hours
Real-time POS exception alerts flag suspicious transactions
Continuous monitoring detects incidents in minutes to hours
Automated shrink dashboards by store and category
Proactive intervention based on predictive risk models
painPointsAddressed: Investigation time reduced 85-95% (30 min - 2 hours vs 10-40 hours)
Detection time reduced to minutes/hours (vs 365 days)

title: Regional Operations Director
label: Regional Operations Director
description: Leads operations for 50-150 stores across a region, responsible for sales, profitability, operational excellence, talent pipeline, and strategic initiatives execution.
responsibilities: Drive regional sales and profitability goals
Ensure operational excellence and brand standards
Develop district manager and store leadership pipeline
Implement regional strategies and programs
Manage regional P&L and capital allocation
Partner with corporate on new initiatives
traditionalWorkflow: Review district performance weekly in manual spreadsheets
Discover operational issues during quarterly business reviews
Talent development based on annual reviews only
Limited visibility into day-to-day store execution
Reactive problem-solving (after metrics decline)
agenticWorkflow: Real-time regional dashboards show all KPIs continuously
Predictive analytics flag stores at risk 2-4 weeks early
Continuous performance data informs talent decisions
Complete visibility into task, compliance, and labor execution
Proactive interventions prevent metric declines

title: Store Operations Analyst
label: Store Operations Analyst
description: Analyzes store performance data, identifies operational improvement opportunities, and supports corporate initiatives deployment across the store network.
responsibilities: Analyze store operations data and trends
Identify best practices and improvement opportunities
Support corporate program rollouts
Create dashboards and performance reports
Conduct business case analysis for initiatives
Partner with IT on systems and tools
traditionalWorkflow: Manually aggregate store data from multiple systems
Spend 60-70% of time on data wrangling vs analysis
Create weekly/monthly reports manually in Excel
Limited ability to identify patterns across stores
Reactive analysis (answer questions after asked)
agenticWorkflow: Automated data aggregation from all store systems
Spend 70-80% of time on insights vs data prep
Real-time dashboards auto-update continuously
AI pattern detection identifies opportunities proactively
Predictive analytics forecast outcomes before deployment
painPointsAddressed: Analysis time shifted to value-add insights
